availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Dobson (Hart County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Hart County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Dobson. Father of William Dobson. Farmer in Green County, Kentucky in 1850. Employed William Johnson as a laborer in Green County in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 142A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, Powder Mill, p. 367B.
